nome_articolo: Infinite Fantozzi E Filini La Bianchina Al Campeggio 1/18 Die-Cast Deluxe Edition
descrizione:
nfinite Statue & Collectibles presents the Fantozzi Bianchina Collection, three 1/18 scale die-cast and ABS models. Each Bianchina is faithfully reproduced in the colors, shapes, and proportions of the cars seen in the films, with real-life functions such as opening doors, steering wheels, and attention to interior detail.
Each Bianchina features two sculpted, non-removable figures in fixed poses, recreating iconic scenes from the Fantozzi films. Fantozzi and Miss Silvani in the first iconic Bianchina inspired by the first "Fantozzi" film from 1975. Fantozzi and Filini in the standard and Deluxe versions of the Bianchina from the 1983 film "Fantozzi Still Suffers."
The Deluxe Bianchina version includes the legendary boat loaded on the roof.
From the memorable scenes of the tragicomic comedy of Accountant Fantozzi, three scale models dedicated to all fans of Italian comedy.
Each model is sold individually.
